definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: The former scene by dinosaur was more wonderful than human's.
sentences.chinese: 刚退场的恐龙戏码，就比我们精彩有趣得多了。

sentences.english: She didn't laugh. Sick of the reporters ambushing me in public toilets, perhaps.
sentences.chinese: 或许我会厌烦记者们将我围堵在洗手间的戏码。

sentences.english: Announced to the public anti-japanese hero Zhao Chuanji take refuge in the Japanese drama.
sentences.chinese: 来向公众们宣布抗日英雄赵传奇投靠日军的戏码。

sentences.english: Northeast of Brazil grassland, a rodeo drama staged every day.
sentences.chinese: 巴西东北的草原边，日日上演暴烈的牛仔竞技戏码。

sentences.english: Scolding from teacher will never happen.
sentences.chinese: 不会有老师马学生的戏码上演。

definition: large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
to screen (a movie)/to stage (a play)/a screening/a staging
each new high point replaced by another/(of a movie etc) one climax after another
the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
sequence of movements in martial arts/routine/pattern/standard method
